alert.note: Alert for Clay; Daviess; Greene; Owen; Putnam; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Vigo, Clay, western Owen, central Greene, southwestern Putnam and northeastern Daviess Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Sullivan to 16 miles south of Brazil to 11 miles northwest of Bloomfield to 12 miles northeast of Washington. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bloomfield and Brazil. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 15 and 35. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Daviess; Greene; Owen; Putnam; Vigo
